name: DISEN Hydraulic Copper Pipe Tube Fittings Crimping Tool with Copper Cutter, PEX Tubing Cutter and Copper Ring Removal Tool, Hydraulic Driven Press Tool with 8 Dies for Copper Pipe or PEX Pipe Crimp
short_description: 【All-in-One Professional Kit】: This hydraulic crimping kit is designed for PEX and copper pipe systems, including a crimper, copper cutter, PEX cutter, ring removal plier, and 8 dies. It supports the complete workflow from cutting and crimping to disassembly, boosting efficiency for both new installations and renovations.

【Wide Die Compatibility】: The set includes dies for 1/2", 3/4", 1" ProPress copper pipe and 3/8" to 1" for ASTM F1807 PEX copper rings. This versatility handles various pipe diameters, saving you the cost and hassle of buying separate dies for different jobs.

【Exclusive Ring Removal Function】The special plier safely removes copper crimp rings (up to 1") from PEX barb fittings without damage. Allows fitting reuse, cutting repair costs and reducing waste—ideal for system adjustments or repairs.

【Efficient Cutting Performance】: Two cutters are included: one for PEX tubing up to 30mm and one for copper tubing up to 1-1/4". Both deliver clean, burr-free cuts with minimal effort, ensuring a proper seal and reducing leak risks during crimping.

【Durable & Long-Lasting Build】:All tools are made from high-quality forged steel for strength and durability. The hydraulic crimper ensures consistent, high-pressure crimps. With an ergonomic design, this professional-grade set is a reliable investment for plumbers and skilled DIYers.
product_details: Included Components ‎8 pairs of crimping dies, Copper Pipe Cutter, Copper Ring Removal Tool, Hydraulic Crimping Tool, PEX Cutter

name: PEX Crimping Tool Kit, 2 in 1 Ratchet Pex Clamp Tool with Cinch & Removal Function for 3/8" to 1" Stainless Steel Clamps, with PEX Cutter and Clamps (1/2" 25PCS, 3/4" 12PCS)
short_description: 【PEX TOOL KIT】All-in-one kit Including: 1pc PEX clamp cinch tool, 1pc pipe cutter, 25pcs 1/2 inch and 12pcs 3/4 inch stainless steel clamps, 1pcs storage bag. The PEX crimping tool kit makes any PEX plumbing job faster and easier.
【CINCH & REMOVAL】Switch from "CLAMP" to "CUT" mode in seconds. The PEX clamp tool creates 360° leak-free connections with clamps. Easily remove clamps from pipe, protecting the pipe and pex fittings.
【DURABLE】Forged from high-strength manganese steel for maximum durability, the PEX crimper resists breakage under pressure. The jaws are processed with Wire EDM Cutting to make precise crimp.

【EFFICIENT】The ratchet & self-releasing mechanism ensures complete and easy crimping. 8.5-inch-long handle wrapped in anti-slip rubber, ergonomic construction reduces hand fatigue, making plumbing work more comfortable.
【UNIVERSAL】Compatible with PEX stainless steel clamps in 3/8", 1/2", 5/8", 3/4" and 1". It also clamps single-ear and double-ear hose clamps within the opening range of the crimper (max 0.5").
【PIPE CUTTER】Sharp blade cuts various pipes, like PEX, rubber pipes, plastic pipes, PE, etc. Easily cut pipes cleanly and smoothly.

short_description: 【Versatile Crimping Tool for 1/2 and 3/4-inch Rings】 Designed to crimp both 1/2 and 3/4-inch copper crimp rings, this PEX tool is a versatile and essential addition to any plumbing toolkit, whether for new installations or repairs.

【Durable Chrome-Plated Jaw Design】 Built with heat-treated steel and upgraded with a thick chrome-plated jaw, this tool resists scratches and impact damage, ensuring the jaws stay intact over time. Unlike black-coated jaws, it leaves no flaking residue on rings or fittings during crimping.
【Go/No-Go Gauge for Accurate Crimps】 Includes a precision Go/No-Go gauge that verifies proper crimp diameter, ensuring secure, leak-free connections that meet plumbing reliability standards.

name: DURATECH Ratchet PEX Crimping Tool, PEX Cinch Tool for Fastening Stainless Clamps from 3/8-in to 1-in, Fits ASTM F2098 Clamps and 10mm Max Width Single Ear Clamps
short_description: SIMPLE AND STRONG PEX CRIMPING TOOL: Our product features a well-built jaw made of CrMo, capable of withstanding high stress and impact, as does the ratchet gear. The wear-resistant ratchet pawl effortlessly secures the joint over time, and the electrophoretic body provides rust resistance and an extended service life.

RELIABLE AND LEAK-PROOF CLAMPS CINCHING: this PEX crimp tool provides even and securely fastened connections to PEX tubings and fittings. It works on 3/8-in, 1/2-in, 5/8-in, 3/4-in, and 1-in stainless steel PEX clamp rings with a width below 10 mm, and can be used with standard ASTM F2098 clamps and single-ear hose clamps

DESIGNED FOR EASY AND SAFE USE: The injection-molded handles are crafted for user comfort, featuring textured and slipfree grips for a more secure hold. Their proper length allows two-handed operation, providing stable pressure for larger clamp rings. The smooth ratcheting mechanism ensures precise power control, keeps the tool securely in place, and provides a quick release after installation.

INSTRUCTIONS FOR CRIMPING AND RELEASING: Hold and press the handles until the ratchet pawl automatically releases to unlock the ratchet system. Insert the clamp ear into the opening, then create a secure, non-slip connection by pressing the crimper precisely and effortlessly. If the clamp ear thickness exceeds 1 mm after tightening, please toggle the ratchet pawl to open it

EXPERT STRENGTH, HOME-READY: This PEX clamp cinching tool meets the demands of plumbing professionals for the installation or repair of residential and commercial PEX plumbing, potable water systems, radiant heating systems and hydronic heating systems. Its simple operation also makes it an essential tool for DIY plumbing projects and emergency situations
